title: Inactivity Notification.
body: So, i log in to the client i got notification that innactivity causes to decay lp. i played few games i got from p5 to p4 in one day, but the notification is still there idk if i can sleep calmly.

replies.body: This might be display error, I'm not seeing anything out of the ordinary.  You've been regularly playing and just got promoted.  Looks good!
